=== Introduction ===

This page is about installing the hal-applesmc package from the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MactelSupportTeam|MactelSupport]]</nowiki> repository.

=== Installation ===

Make sure the <nowiki>[[Mactel PPA]]</nowiki> repository is enabled.

Now get the hal-applesmc package
<pre>
sudo apt-get install hal-applesmc
</pre>
Restart X (logout)
